name: @stadtmessungsamt-stuttgart/geoline.ol.js
description: Bibliothek zur einfachen Einbindung von Kartendiensten des Stadtmessungsamtes Stuttgart in OpenLayers
author: Stadtmessungsamt, LHS Stuttgart

scripts.build-js: parcel build src/geoline.ol.js --target geoline.ol.js --no-scope-hoist --no-cache && cross-var replace '@version@' $npm_package_version dist/geoline.ol.js/geoline.ol.js && cross-var replace '@version@' $npm_package_version dist/geoline.ol.js/geoline.ol.js
scripts.build-examples: parcel build examples/example*.html --no-content-hash --no-scope-hoist --no-cache --public-url '.' --target examples && cross-var replace '@version@' $npm_package_version dist/examples/example.html
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-examples
scripts.cy:open: concurrently -k -s first "parcel examples/example.html examples/testdata/**/*" "wait-on http://localhost:1234 && cypress open"
scripts.cy:run: concurrently -k -s first "parcel examples/example.html examples/testdata/**/*" "wait-on http://localhost:1234 && cypress run --browser chrome"
scripts.demo: npm run build-demo && npm run serve-demo
